channel.description: Recent content in 学外语 on Mainroad

item.title: MyWordNote
item.description: When i meet some word that I can’t known its meaning , i will record it here . Just for my convenience to remember how to spell convenient 方便 adj convenience 方便 c layman 外行人 c term 期限，条约，条款，描述，术语，专业名词 in xxxx terms，对xxx来说。eg：in Layman‘s terms，从外行人眼里看 capacity 容量，能力 assume /əˈsuːm/ 假设，假冒，承担，呈现，控制的 boundary 边界 europe 欧洲
